      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the instance of Game

      Sets the instance of the game to null.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(@NotNull @NotNull String username) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks the username. If the username is correct, it adds it to the players arrayList. If the player is the first, it sets it as currentPlayer.
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username is not correct (already used). This exception is caught by lobby() method in Server.

      Specified by:
      chooseTowerColor in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has chosen the tower color.
      towerColor - the color of the tower.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - when the user's chosen tower color has already been chosen.

    • chooseWizard

      public void chooseWizard(Player player, Wizard wizard) throws IllegalClientInputException, ChangeTurnException
      Set the wizard to the player and removes it from the available wizards list; Create a new request to the next player.
      Specified by:
      chooseWizard in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      player - the player who set the wizard.
      wizard - the wizard selected by the player.
      Throws:

    • chooseAssistantCard

      public void chooseAssistantCard(Player player, AssistantCard assistantCard) throws IllegalClientInputException, ChangeTurnException
      When last player chooses an assistant card, sort players ArrayList based on assistant cards value, thus the ACTION PHASE starts. Otherwise, set next player that should choose an assistant card.
      Specified by:
      chooseAssistantCard in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      player - the current player.
      assistantCard - the assistant card to play.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if the player can't play the given assistant card.
      ChangeTurnException

    • setup

      public void setup()
      This method executes the SETUP phase of the game. Then it starts the PLANNING PHASE.
      Specified by:
      setup in class GameMode

    • setupBag

      public void setupBag()
      This method places two students for each color into the bag.

      setupBag in class GameMode

    • setupIslands

      public void setupIslands()
      This method places two students on every island except the one with mother nature on and the one in front of.
      Specified by:
      setupIslands in class GameMode

    • setupEntrance

      public void setupEntrance()
      This method add 7 students into the entrance when is 2-player Game or 9 students when is a 3-player Game.
      Specified by:
      setupEntrance in class GameMode

    • setupPlayers

      public void setupPlayers()
      This method sorts the players ArrayList randomly and sets the current player.
      Specified by:
      setupPlayers in class GameMode

    • planningPhase

      public void planningPhase()
      Executes a part of the planning phase, filling the cloud tiles and resetting the assistant cards played in last round. If the Game mode is Expert, it also sets the "already played character chard boolean attribute" to false.
      Specified by:
      planningPhase in class GameMode

    • addStudentsToCloudTiles

      public void addStudentsToCloudTiles()
      Adds the students to the cloud tiles and sets the last round flag if the bag is empty. It sends messages to communicate the new filled cloud tiles and if the bag is empty.

    • resetPlayedCardInTurn

      private void resetPlayedCardInTurn()
      This method removes the played assistant card of the previous turn.

    • executeActionMoveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void executeActionMoveStudentToDiningRoom(Color student) throws LastMoveException, IllegalClientInputException
      Executes the action of moving a player from entrance to the dining room.
      Specified by:
      executeActionMoveStudentToDiningRoom in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to move.
      Throws:
      LastMoveException
      IllegalClientInputException

    • executeActionMoveStudentToIsland

      public void executeActionMoveStudentToIsland(Color student, int idIsland) throws IllegalClientInputException, LastMoveException
      Specified by:
      executeActionMoveStudentToIsland in class GameMode
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to move.
      idIsland - the id of the island where the player wants to move the student to.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if the island doesn't exist or if there aren't students of the color specified by the player in the entrance.
      LastMoveException - if the player has moved the students three times.

      Manages the action of the player to choose the cloud tile.

    • sortPlayerPerTurn

      public void sortPlayerPerTurn() throws ChangeTurnException
      This method defines the game turn based on the played assistant cards.
      Throws:
      ChangeTurnException

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer() throws ChangeTurnException
      This method is used to manage the turns in preparation and planning phases. When the currentPlayer is not the last in turn, set the currentPlayer to the next one. When the last wizard has been chosen, we call setup method and order randomly the players' arraylist. Otherwise, set current player to the first player in the sorted players' arraylist.
      Throws:
      ChangeTurnException - if there's not another player that has to play in the current phase.

    • nextGameTurn

      private void nextGameTurn() throws EndGameException, ChangeTurnException
      Changes current player at the end of every action phase. At the end of the last player's action phase, it starts a new planning phase.
      Throws:
      EndGameException
      ChangeTurnException

    • calculateWinner

      public void calculateWinner()
      This method calculates the winner when one player has the max number of towers onto islands. If two or more players have the same number of towers on islands, is called a new method for the calculation of the winner because of professors. If there is a winner, virtualViews are notified using a WinMessage.
      Specified by:
      calculateWinner in class GameMode

    • checkForTie

      private void checkForTie(List<Player> list)
      This method checks occurrences of players in list into the professors array. If one of the players has more professors than the others, he's the winner, else we have a tie. In case of tie we notify virtualViews using a TieMessage, which specifies the list of the peer players.
      Parameters:
      list - gains the list of the players that have the same number of towers, so they are potentially peer.

    • endGame

      public void endGame(boolean correctEnd)
      Ends the game resetting the instance of the game.
      Specified by:
      endGame in class GameMode

      useCharacterCard in class GameMode
      Parameters:

      idCard - to play.
